title: Code Symphony
textContent:
In twilight's glow, the screen's soft light,  
A symphony of code takes flight,  
Lines of logic, rhythms pure,  
A dance of functions, swift and sure.

The keys like whispers tap the beat,  
In patterns tight, algorithms meet,  
Loops and branches, paths unfold,  
A tale in syntax, silently told.

Variables like stars align,  
In constellations, logic's sign,  
Each function, module, crafted well,  
A coder's art, a magic spell.

In this quiet, thoughtful night,  
Where code and dream converge in sight,  
A symphony of thoughts unspoken,  
In every line, a world awoken.
